our-mission.title: Green Economy Initiatives
our-mission.tagline: Driving sustainable growth, enhancing capacity, and fostering innovation throughout Africa to create lasting positive impacts on communities, economies, and the environment.

mission.title: Circular economy
mission.desc: Conduct of research in green economy and growth opportunities (micro and macro capital assets) in Africa.

mission.title: Capacity building
mission.desc: Provision of technical expertise to build the capacity of policymakers and critical stakeholders on green economy.

mission.title: Green legislation
mission.desc: Promotion of green legislation that foster the emergence of robust governance and institutional arrangement.

mission.title: Green transitions
mission.desc: Leverage green financing and technology to support transition of communities & private sector players to green growth & investments.

our-project.title: Knowledge Products
our-project.tagline: AGDF addresses environmental issues by focusing on key areas to improve local livelihoods, including governance, agriculture, forestry, water management, tourism, renewable energy, waste, manufacturing, and transport.
